entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
